questions.topic: What brings you to our site
questions.question: Are you looking at building your own home, or helping us build for others?
btn: I'd like to partner with Homebound

questions.topic: We'd love to learn more about your project
questions.question: Let's get started and see if Homebound is right for you.

questions.topic: Where would you like to build?
questions.question: Let's see if you're in our operating markets.

questions.topic: Do you already have land to build on?
questions.question: We can help you find a lot if you don't already have one.
ans: I already have existing land to build on.

questions.topic: Do you have a budget in mind for your completed home?
questions.question: Our team of experts has built over 5,000+ homes collectively, over decades of working in custom home building. Our experience spans diversified builds from less than $500K to over $5M.
We will only use your information to respond to your request.

questions.desc: Since each homeowner has unique needs, a complimentary informational meeting with a Homebound representative is where we should start.
questions.desc2: You don't have to prepare anything. We'll answer any questions you may have and share our unique process.
questions.question: Where would you like to meet?
